name: Dino Survival (itch) (toowiggly)
description:
WASD: Move
Left Click: Grab/Throw (fruit)
Right Click: Bite (fruit and enemies)
Shift: Sprint
Tab: Pause
R/Enter: Reset Game
Escape: Quit Game


Scavenge for apples to fill your hunger metre. Find mates to breed with and make it to later generations. As you play, your stats will increase and your dino will become stronger. The goal is to get as high of a generation as possible.
